definition: a small wave on the surface of a liquid, stir up (water) so as to form ripples
details:
noun
- a small wave on the surface of a liquid
= synonyms: riffle
- an oscillation of small amplitude imposed on top of a steady value
= example: an oscillation of small amplitude imposed on top of a steady value
verb
- stir up (water) so as to form ripples
= synonyms: riffle
- flow in an irregular current with a bubbling noise
= synonyms: bubble
